data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reshchikov, Alexey V. (2013): Two new species of Lathrolestes (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae) from Norway, northern Russia and Finland with a key to western Palaearctic species. Zootaxa 3681 (1): 59-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3681.1.3
